ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: Different spells teleport you to different zones.  As for where in the zone, I m not sure, but I would assume there is a specified location in the zone that
ygData.messageBody:
Different spells teleport you to different zones. As for where in the zone,
I'm not sure, but I would assume there is a specified location in the zone
that you will always appear at.

Tandeyan, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 4:36 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class


>From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
>How do those group teleports work anyways? Do you get to choose a
destination? Or are there different location group teleports.. like "Group
teleport to Neriak" etc?
>
>Thanks
>
>Drev
